attributes.action: introduce legislation immediately to change the law so that any tax liability on income from letting a property is scrapped.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will put members of the (reducing by the minute) taxpaying fraternity of this country on a par with government ministers who receive GBP24,000.00p allowance on their main home; are provided with grace and favour accommodation (without being taxed on the benefit - as we 'normal' people would be) and then receive tax free income from letting on accommodation they own in London which has been paid for by the taxpayer through the huge tax free allowances anyway!
